attributes.action: Provide more bus times for the 44 bus route in Manchester
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Right now, the 44 bus in Manchester comes once every hour, so if you miss this bus, you have to wait one whole hour for the next one thus creating unneccessary problems for the everyday person. By signing this petition, we're asking to at least make the bus come twice every hour or better.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
